channel.title: USB hard drive as additional volume
channel.description:
I run Whonix via VirtualBox on an Ubuntu flash drive host system. As I do not have enough storage left on this flash drive I would like to connect an additional external hard drive.
My plan is to connect this external hard drive and add this one as a new virtual hard drive in virtual box. I will then mount this new storage in my workstation.
Is it possible like this? Should I encrypt the external hard drive additionally?
